name: nativescript-peek-update
description: Allows the Peek platform to deploy content to the Nativescript apps

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns run android --justlaunch
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-code-push && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build android
scripts.test.android: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns test android
scripts.test.ios: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns test ios
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-code-push && cd ../src
